Record.ClassificationPath: Otorhinolaryngologic Diseases/Ear Diseases/Labyrinth Diseases/Endolymphatic Hydrops/Meniere Disease
Record.Description: A disease of the inner ear (LABYRINTH) that is characterized by fluctuating SENSORINEURAL HEARING LOSS; TINNITUS; episodic VERTIGO; and aural fullness. It is the most common form of endolymphatic hydrops.
